name: @n8n-as-code/agent-cli
description: AI Agent Tools for n8n-as-code (Search, Get Schema)

scripts.prebuild: node ../../scripts/ensure-n8n-cache.cjs && node ../../scripts/generate-n8n-index.cjs && node ../../scripts/download-complete-docs.cjs && node ../../scripts/build-complete-index.cjs && node ../../scripts/enrich-nodes-technical.cjs && node ../../scripts/build-knowledge-index.cjs && node ../../scripts/build-workflow-index.cjs
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist/assets dist/data && cp src/assets/n8n-docs-complete.json dist/assets/ && cp src/assets/n8n-nodes-technical.json dist/assets/ && cp src/assets/n8n-knowledge-index.json dist/assets/ && cp src/data/workflows-index.json dist/data/
